page.title: 13SPORT
page.content: In Aslockton there are quite a few sports played.We play Football and cricket.In our next village which is called Whatton,there is a cricket field and it has a cricket pitch on it and a football pitch on.When it is the cricket season they play cricket on Saturday and Sunday.When it is the football season they play every Sunday. The football team is made out of the people who go to the pub. Aslockton and Whatton have an under 15 cricket team.Our school has a cricket team and football team.During the football season we didn't loose one match.Our cricket team was nearly as good too. We managed to win the county league. We play a special kind of cricket with only eight players and a soft ball. Alot of people in the villages play squash, badminton and other games at the Bingham centre.
